name: Watch those weka!
description:
Use WASD to move around the campground. Stand by the porridge on the table to cook it, and chase down any weka that try to escape with your vital camping snacks.

Made in 3 hours for Trijam 198, where the theme was "Let's go camping!".

Programming by Haydoggo

Art and music by ShallotB

Game design by us both :)
